bounties.name: Colony Construction
bounties.description: Assist in the building of new habitat structures.

bounties.name: Drainage System Repair
bounties.description: Fix leaks and improve the efficiency of the colony's water recycling system.

bounties.name: Hydroponic Farming
bounties.description: Cultivate and harvest crops in the hydroponic farms.

bounties.name: Solar Panel Maintenance
bounties.description: Conduct routine maintenance and repairs on solar panels.

bounties.name: Atmosphere Monitoring
bounties.description: Analyze and report on the colony's atmospheric conditions.

bounties.name: Medical Research
bounties.description: Participate in medical studies to understand health in Martian conditions.

bounties.name: Rover Deployment
bounties.description: Assist in the deployment and operation of exploration rovers.
